resources.string: Welcome user. Click On that mic button and get the details you want to get

This Application gives details of employees working in BR Refinery by voice recognition with one button! You get address , contact details , vehicle number and many more details using both voice and text feature.
1.tap on mic button.\n 2.say address/phone number or anything of any employee\n 3.Wait for the app to respond
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> BR Voice Buddy -> clear data
